character_triggers.description: A collection of triggers that define when and how characters can activate special effects or abilities.

allow_tooltips_when_hidden.description: Whether tooltips should be shown even when the trigger is hidden.

descriptions.description: Localized text descriptions for this trigger's effect.

display_hint_text.description: Whether to display hint text for this trigger.

effects.description: List of effects that are associated with this trigger.

id.description: Reference to an effect's unique identifier.

hide_tooltip.description: Whether to hide the tooltip for this trigger.

id.description: Unique identifier for this character trigger. Used to reference this trigger from characters.

only_trigger_if_equipped.description: Whether this trigger only activates if the character has equipment.

show_text_on_trigger_success_only.description: Whether to only show text when the trigger successfully activates.

suppress_notifications.description: Whether to suppress notifications when this trigger activates.

text_on_trigger.description: Text to display when this trigger activates.

trigger.description: The type of event that activates this trigger.

trigger_once.description: Whether this trigger can only activate once.

trigger_at_threshold.description: This value tells the trigger to only fire if a parameter is greater than this number. The parameter value is determined by the trigger type. (i.e. for a Revenge trigger the parameter will be the amount of damage taken.)

items.description: A character trigger definition that specifies when and how a character can activate special effects.
